trans-unit.source: Simple, private, free access to the open Internet you love.
trans-unit.target: SXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

trans-unit.source: Download TunnelBear VPN free for your iPhone / iPad to protect your online privacy, access your favourite websites, and browse securely on Wifi hotspots.
trans-unit.target: Download TunnelBear VPN free for your iPhone / iPad to protect your online privacy, access your favourite websites, and browse securely on Wifi hotspots.

trans-unit.source: This beautiful app gives you 500MB of free data each and every month, with more free data when you tell your friends about TunnelBear.
trans-unit.target: Bu harika uygulama sana her ay 500 MB ücretsiz veri kullanımı veriyor, hatta arkadaşlarına TunnelBear’den bahsedersen daha fazla veri kazanıyorsun.

trans-unit.source: Features:
trans-unit.target: Özellikler:

trans-unit.source: * A beautifully simple app. On, off. It's that easy.
trans-unit.target: İşte o kadar.

trans-unit.source: * Access to your favourite websites, anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.target: * Her zaman, her yerde en sevdiğin sitelere erişim.

trans-unit.source: * Lightning fast connection speeds to 20+ countries in our ever expanding network.
trans-unit.target: * Giderek büyüyen ağımızdaki 20'den fazla ülkede yıldırım hızında bağlantı.

trans-unit.source: * Browse the Internet with more privacy from hackers, ISPs and anyone monitoring your network.
trans-unit.target: * Hacker'lara, internet servis sağlayıcılarına ve ağını izleyenlere karşı internette gizlice dolaşabilme.

trans-unit.source: * Encrypt your data to browse with confidence while you’re connected to wifi hotspots.
trans-unit.target: * Wi-Fi noktalarına bağlıyken güvenle internete girmek için verini şifreleme.

trans-unit.source: * Helpful support that always responds within 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: * Helpful support that always responds within 24 hours.

trans-unit.source: Privacy Policy:
trans-unit.target: Gizlilik Politikası:

trans-unit.source: Spoiler alert - no logging! Check out our straightforward, plain-english privacy policy here: https://www.tunnelbear.com/privacy-policy
Upgrade your bear:
trans-unit.target: Upgrade your bear:

trans-unit.source: TunnelBear subscriptions provide unlimited data, access to all of our server locations, and can be used on up to five devices. We offer two types of auto-renewing subscriptions: Full and iOS-only.
- A full plan can be purchased within the app for $6.99 monthly, or $49.99 yearly (saving a whopping 42%!).
trans-unit.target: - A full plan can be purchased within the app for $6.99 monthly, or $49.99 yearly (saving a whopping 42%!).

trans-unit.source: - An iOS-only plan can be purchased within the app for $3.99 monthly, or $29.99 yearly (saving 39%!). This plan is for iPhones and iPads only.
* Payments are charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase
trans-unit.target: * Payments are charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase

trans-unit.source: * Your subscription will automatically renew 24 hours before the end of each current period (monthly or yearly depending on what you choose) unless auto-renewal is turned off.
trans-unit.target: * Your subscription will automatically renew 24 hours before the end of each current period (monthly or yearly depending on what you choose) unless auto-renewal is turned off.

trans-unit.source: * Auto-renewal can be turned off at any time within the user’s Apple ID Account Settings > Manage Subscriptions
trans-unit.target: * Otomatik yenileme, Apple Kimlik Hesabı Ayarları > Abonelikleri Yönet'ten her zaman kapatılabilir

trans-unit.source: Support:
trans-unit.target: Support:

trans-unit.source: Looking to learn a cool bear fact? Is your TunnelBear misbehaving? Contact support at support@tunnelbear.com
